name: Halpert's Booking
subtitle: Hotel booking website made with HTML & CSS.
desc: Hoops is a unique social media application where users can connect and chat with each other using letters while being completely anonymous.

sections.sectionText: A smooth and beautifully designed onboarding and login.

sectionData.text: The homepage is very simple with a large navigation pane for different pages with a beautiful gradient background and smooth hover effects.
A beautiful array of destinations and hotel types is laid out neatly to give you a holistic understanding of where to go.
The search screen is made to be very minimal with a persistent colorful search helper pane sticked to the left side and all the search results neatly displayed on the right.
The project also uses simple UI modules such as this beautiful calendar model which make it simple to select a date range for a specific trip.
